experiment_title: Illumina HiSeq 2500 sequencing: GSM3004143: CTRL_1_130d (techn. Rep. 1) Homo sapiens RNA-Seq
description: Illumina HiSeq 2500 sequencing: GSM3004143: CTRL_1_130d (techn. Rep. 1) Homo sapiens RNA-Seq
library_construction_protocol: RNA was isolated from individual organoids using RNeasy Micro Kit (QIAGEN, cat. #74004) according to the manufacturers instructions. RNA concentration and integrity was analysed using RNA 6000 Nano Chip (Agilent techReplicatenologies, cat. #5067-1511). RNA was enriched for mRNA using SMART-Seq v4 Ultra Low Input RNA Kit (Clontech, cat. # 634891). Libraries were prepared using NEBNext Ultra Directional RNA Library Prep Kit for Illumina (NEB, cat. # E7420L). Barcoded samples were multiplexed and sequenced 50bp SE on a HighSeq2500 (Illumina). Sample preparation and sequencing was performed at the VBCF NGS Unit (www.vbcf.ac.at). Samples were sequenced twice each.
